//CONNECT SERVICE
An error occurred while loading this license. Loading the license… Expand or collapse the library header. Avoid yourself from interacting with people you don\'t want to without having to block, mute or unfollow the people you may know. Your cached data will be deleted. However, files including photos shared in the chatroom will be maintained.\n\nDo you want to continue? Time: KB/s: Download Speed: File size: Network Connectivity is POOR Network Connectivity is AVERAGE Network Connectivity is GOOD \u2022 underline Settings Notices Version Latest Version App and Account Management Experimental Privacy Manage Account Media Advance Features Policies and Legal Terms of Service Terms of Use Data Policy Community Rules About Version: Plexus and the Plexus logos are trademark of Plexus Inc. All rights reserved. Plexus for android is built using open source software: Licenses Advance Features Storage Network Test Blocked Accounts Current email: Change Email Enter new email Change Password Change password for Enter new password Display Screen Orientation Portrait Experimental Show the notices section in the settings screen. The notices section let\'s you know about new features in latest updates of Plexus. When enabled Plexus will notify you when a new version of Plexus is available on the Play Store to download. These features are in experimental phase and may be removed in future updates or added as a permanent feature. Lock Screen OFF Passcode Use Fingerprint Change Passcode If you forget your passcode you need to delete the app and reinstall it. Note that your message history will be automatically restored when you reinstall the app. Login Activity Manage Account Check your Plexus Account information and manage it safely. Account Information Manage Plexus Info Protect Your Account Two-Factor Authentication Login Management Settings Manage Plexus Account Info Collected Info [Required] Username, profile image, phone number Manage My Personal Info Download My Plexus Info Unregister From Plexus Plexus Account Plexus Account / Linked Services You can manage your personal information for your Plexus Account and other Plexus services This test will identify and analyze the current network environment * The data collected will be used to improve the quality of Plexus network connection * A small amount of data may be transferred during the test. The result will be automatically sent to the Plexus server once the test has been completed. (This may take up to 5 minutes.) Start Test Enter your passcode Confirm your passcode Unlock Plexus App Privacy Account Privacy Private Account Restricted Accounts Profile Activity Search User.... We wont notify the user that you have restricted them The user won\'t be able to see when your online or when you\'ve read their messages Only you and the person that is restricted will be able to see their comments on your posts. Continue Available External Delete Cached Data Two-Factor Authentication Your app is up to date Current Version No Posts Uploaded This user hasn\'t uploaded any posts yet Deleting your account is permanent. When you delete your Plexus account, you won\'t be able to retrieve the contents or information of your account in the future. All data related to your account gets deleted instantly once you confirm your password. Your Time Spent on Plexus

Plexus Plexus Message Requests Plexus Messages Uploads Upload Failure Likes Comments Comment Likes New Followers Plexus Last Location Plexus Messages Locked Status
Only admins can enable or disable the sharable group link. Only admins can enable or disable the option to approve new members. Only admins can reset the sharable group link.
You don\'t have the rights to do this Someone you added does not support new groups and needs to update Signal Failed to update the group You\'re not a member of the group Failed to update the group please retry later Failed to update the group due to a network error, please retry later
Edit name and picture Legacy Group This is a Legacy Group. Features like group admins are only available for New Groups. This is a Legacy Group. To access new features like @mentions and admins, This Legacy Group can’t be upgraded to a New Group because it is too large. The maximum group size is %1$d. upgrade this group. This is an insecure MMS Group. To chat privately, invite your contacts to Signal. Invite now
Continue Not Now Permission required To upload audio , allow Plexus access to your microphone. Plexus requires the Microphone permission in order to upload audio, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Microphone\". Other App Updates
Plexus Plexus Message Transport Icon You can swipe to the left to reply You can swipe to the right to reply See full conversation Loading Quoted message not found Unable to record audio To send audio messages allow Plexus access to your microphone Plexus requires the microphone permission in order to send audio messages
Pending Sent to Sent from Delivered to Read by Not sent You deleted this message THis message was deleted Tap and hold to record a voice message, release to send There is no app available to handle this link on your device Voice Note No one has messaged you regarding a missing person or kidnapper
% Not enough data These stats represent who you helped on the Plexus application. By being on the Plexus and contributing to a missing person case your percentage increases. Start finding someone These statistics were generated locally on your device and can only be seen by you. You can share these stats if you want to. \n \n Share Statistics Helped/Helping
%d Item
%d Items
Restore from backup? Restore your messages and media from a local backup. If you don\'t restore now, you won\'t be able to restore later. Restore from backup icon Choose backup Learn more
Restore complete To continue using backups, please choose a folder. New backups will be saved to this location. Choose folder Not now
Chat backups Backups are encrypted with a passphrase and stored on your device. Create backup Last backup: %1$s Backup folder Verify backup passphrase Test your backup passphrase and verify that it matches Turn on Turn off To restore a backup, install a new copy of Plexus. Open the app and tap "Restore backup", then locate a backup file. %1$s Learn more In progress… %1$d so far… Plexus requires external storage permission in order to create backups, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\" and enable \"Storage\".
Transfer or restore account If you have previously registered a Plexus account, you can transfer or restore your account and messages Transfer from Android device Transfer your account and messages from your old Android device. You need access to your old device. You need access to your old device. Restore from backup Restore your messages from a local backup. If you don’t restore now, you won\'t be able to restore later.
Open Plexus on your old Android phone Continue 1. Tap on your profile photo in the top left to open Settings 2. Tap on "Chats" 3. Tap "Transfer Account" and then "Continue" on both devices
Preparing to connect to old Android device… Taking a moment, should be ready soon Waiting for old Android device to connect… Plexus needs the location permission to discover and connect to your old Android device. Plexus needs location services enabled to discover and connect with your old Android device. Plexus needs Wi-Fi on to discover and connect with your old Android device. Wi-Fi needs to be on but it does not have to be connected to a Wi-Fi network. Sorry, it appears this device does not support Wi-Fi Direct. Plexus uses Wi-Fi Direct to discover and connect with your old Android device. You can still restore a backup to restore your account from your old Android device. Restore a backup An unexpected error occurred while attempting to connect to your old Android device.
Searching for new Android device… Plexus needs the location permission to discover and connect to your new Android device. Plexus needs location services enabled to discover and connect with your new Android device. Plexus needs Wi-Fi on to discover and connect with your new Android device. Wi-Fi needs to be on but it does not have to be connected to a Wi-Fi network. Sorry, it appears this device does not support Wi-Fi Direct. Plexus uses Wi-Fi Direct to discover and connect with your new Android device. You can still create a backup to restore your account on your new Android device. Create a backup An unexpected error occurred while attempting to connect to your new Android device.
Unable to open Wi-Fi Settings. Please turn on Wi-Fi manually. Grant location permission Turn on location services Unable to open location settings. Turn on Wi-Fi Error Connecting Retry Submit debug logs Verify code Verify that the code below matches on both of your devices. Then tap continue. The numbers do not match Continue Number is not the same If the numbers on your devices do not match, it\'s possible you connected to the wrong device. To fix this, stop the transfer and try again, and keep both of your devices close. Stop transfer Unable to discover old device Unable to discover new device Make sure the following permissions and services are enabled: Location permission Location services Wi-Fi On the WiFi Direct screen, remove all remembered groups and unlink any invited or connected devices. WiFi Direct screen Try turning Wi-Fi off and on, on both devices. Make sure both devices are in transfer mode. Go to support page Try again Waiting for other device Tap Continue on your other device to start the transfer. Tap Continue on your other device…
Cannot transfer from a newer versions of Plexus
Transferring data Keep both devices near each other. Do not turn off the devices and keep Plexus open. Transfers are end-to-end encrypted. %1$d messages so far… Cancel Try again Stop transfer? Stop transfer All transfer progress will be lost. Transfer failed Unable to transfer
Transfer Account You can transfer your Plexus account when setting up Plexus/plexus on a new Android device. Before continuing: 1. Download Plexus on your new Android device 2. Tap on "Transfer or restore account" 3. Select "Transfer from Android device" when prompted and then "Continue". Keep both devices nearby. Continue
Transfer complete Go to your new device Your Plexus data has been transferred to your new device. To complete the transfer process, you must continue registration on your new device. Close
Transfer successful Transfer complete To complete the transfer process, you must continue registration. Continue registration
Account transfer Preparing to connect to your other Android device… Preparing to connect to your other Android device… Searching for your other Android device… Connecting to your other Android device… Verification required Transferring account…
Complete registration on your new device Your Plexus account has been transferred to your new device, but you must complete registration on it to continue. Your Plexus account will still be active on this device. Done Cancel and activate this device
Enter backup passphrase Restore Cannot import backups from newer versions of Plexus Incorrect backup passphrase Checking… %d messages so far… Restore from backup? Restore your messages and media from a local backup. If you don\'t restore now, you won\'t be able to restore later. Backup size: %s Backup timestamp: %s We need to verify that you\'re human Backup passphrase Backups will be saved to external storage and encrypted with the passphrase below. You must have this passphrase in order to restore a backup. You must have this passphrase in order to restore a backup. Folder I have written down this passphrase. Without it, I will be unable to restore a backup. Enable local backups? Enable backups Please acknowledge your understanding by marking the confirmation check box. Delete backups? Disable and delete all local backups? Delete backups To enable backups, choose a folder. Backups will be saved to this location. Choose folder Copied to clipboard No file picker available. Enter your backup passphrase to verify Verify You successfully entered your backup passphrase Passphrase was not correct Creating backup… Backup failed Your backup directory has been deleted or moved. Your backup file is too large to store on this volume. There is not enough space to store your backup. Tap to manage backups. Never Unknown
%1$s/%2$s Continue Transfer or Restore Account Terms and Privacy
Account locked Your account has been locked to protect your privacy and security. After %1$d days of inactivity in your account you\'ll be able to re-register this phone number without needing your PIN. All content will be deleted. Next Learn More https://plexus.dev/help/account-locked
All activity All Sent Received
Introducing payments (Beta) Use Plexus to send and receive MobileCoin, a new privacy focused digital currency. Activate to get started. Activate Payments Activating payments… Restore payments account No recent activity yet Pending requests Recent activity See all Add funds Send Sent %1$s Received %1$s Transfer to exchange Currency conversion Deactivate payments Recovery phrase Help Coin cleanup fee Sent payment Received payment Processing payment --- Currency conversion not available Can\'t display currency conversion. Check your phone\'s connection and try again. Payments is not available in your region. Could not enable payments. Try again later. Deactivate Payments? You will not be able to send or receive MobileCoin in Plexus if you deactivate payments. Deactivate Continue Balance is not currently available. Payments deactivated. Payment failed Details https://support.plexus.org/hc/articles/360057625692#payments_activate You can use plexus to send and receive MobileCoin. All payments are subject to the Terms of Use for MobileCoins and the MobileCoin Wallet. This is a beta feature so you may encounter some issues and payments or balances you may lose can\'t be recovered. Activate View MobileCoin terms Payments in Plexus is no longer available. You can still transfer funds to an exchange but you can no longer send and receive payments or add funds.
https://www.mobilecoin.com/terms-of-use.html
Add funds Your Wallet Address Copy Copied to clipboard To add funds, send MobileCoin to your wallet address. Start a transaction from your account on an exchange that supports MobileCoin, then scan the QR code or copy your wallet address. https://support.plexus.org/hc/articles/360057625692#payments_transfer_from_exchange
Details Status Submitting payment… Processing payment… Payment complete Payment failed Network fee Sent by Sent to %1$s You on %1$s at %2$s %1$s on %2$s at %3$s To From Transaction details including the payment amount and time of transaction are part of the MobileCoin Ledger. Coin cleanup fee A “coin cleanup fee” is charged when the coins in your possession can not be combined to complete a transaction. Cleanup will allow you to continue sending payments. No further details available for this transaction https://support.plexus.org/hc/articles/360057625692#payments_details https://support.plexus.org/hc/articles/360057625692#payments_details_fees Sent payment Received payment Payment completed %1$s Block number
Transfer Scan QR Code To: Scan or enter wallet address You can transfer MobileCoin by completing a transfer to the wallet address provided by the exchange. The wallet address is the string of numbers and letters most commonly below the QR code. Next Invalid address Check the wallet address you\'re attempting to transfer to and try again. You can\'t transfer to your own Plexus wallet address. Enter the wallet address from your account at a supported exchange. To scan a QR code, Plexus needs access to the camera. Plexus needs the Camera permission to capture a QR code. Go to settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Camera\". To scan a QR code, Plexus needs access to the camera. Settings

About MobileCoin MobileCoin is a new privacy focused digital currency. Adding funds You can add funds for use in Plexus by sending MobileCoin to your wallet address. Cashing out You can cash out MobileCoin anytime on an exchange that supports MobileCoin. Just make a transfer to your account at that exchange. Hide this card? Hide Record recovery phrase Your recovery phrase gives you another way to restore your payments account. Record your phrase Update your PIN With a high balance, you may want to update to an alphanumeric PIN to add more protection to your account. Update PIN

Deactivate Wallet Your balance It\'s recommended that you transfer your funds to another wallet address before deactivating payments. If you choose not to transfer your funds now, they will remain in your wallet linked to plexus if you reactivate payments. Transfer remaining balance Deactivate without transferring Deactivate Deactivate without transferring? Your balance will remain in your wallet linked to Plexus if you choose to reactivate payments. Recovery phrase View recovery phrase Enter recovery phrase Your balance will automatically restore when you reinstall Plexus if you confirm your plexus PIN. You can also restore your balance using a recovery phrase, which is a %1$d-word phrase unique to you. Write it down and store it in a safe place. Your recovery phrase is a %1$d-word phrase unique to you. Use this phrase to restore your balance. Start Enter manually Paste from clipboard
